LABEL.NAME: Name

LABEL.AGREE_TO_TERMS_1_ARTWORK: By uploading your artwork, you agree to our

TITLE.DELETE_POST: Are you sure you want to delete the post?

ERROR.TITLE: Error
ERROR.EMAIL_IS_INVALID_PASSWORD_IS_REQUIRED: Email is invalid and password required
ERROR.EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: Email not found or password is wrong
ERROR.REQUIRED_AGREE_PRIVACY: You should agree to Privacy Policy
ERROR.MIN_LENGTH_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 character long!
ERROR.WRONG_TYPE: Invalid file type. Please select an image.
ERROR.MAX_LIMIT: You've exceeded the maximum character limit.
ERROR.WEBSITE_FORMAT: Please enter a valid website address.
ERROR.NICKNAME_SPACES: Please ensure the input contains only alphanumeric characters, underscores, hyphens, and no spaces.
ERROR.NOTHING_TO_CHANGE: Cannot submit the form as no changes have been made.
ERROR.INVALID_DECADE: Invalid decade. Please enter a valid decade (ending with 0).
ERROR.INVALID_CENTURY: Invalid input. Please enter correct Roman numerals only.
ERROR.URL_COPY: Couldn't copy URL. Try again later!
ERROR.MAXIMUM_OF_TAGS: You've exceeded the maximum allowable tag count of 50
ERROR.DELETE_POST: Sorry, you are not authorized to delete this post!

SUCCESS.TITLE: Success
SUCCESS.RESET_PASSWORD: Instructions how to reset your password have been sent to your email!
SUCCESS.CHANGED_PASSWORD: Your password has been successfully changed!
SUCCESS.AVATAR: Avatar successfully selected! Welcome to the home page!

404.CONTENT_1: The page you are attempting to reach is currently not available.
404.CONTENT_2: This may be because the page does not exist or has been moved.

SIGN_UP_PAGE.TITLE: Create a new account
SIGN_UP_PAGE.VERIFICATION_INFO_1: We've just sent you an email to confirm your account.
SIGN_UP_PAGE.VERIFICATION_INFO_2: If you haven't received it yet, please click the button below to resend the confirmation email.
SIGN_UP_PAGE.RESEND_INFO_2: seconds until another email can be send

ACTIVATE_PAGE.VERIFIED_ALREADY: Your account has already been verified.
ACTIVATE_PAGE.VERIFIED_NO: Your account has not been verified yet.
ACTIVATE_PAGE.VERIFIED_YES: Your account has been successfully verified!

RESET_PASSWORD_PAGE.TITLE: Please enter your email to reset your password.
RESET_PASSWORD_PAGE.RESET_INFO_2: seconds before attempting to reset the password again. Thank you for your patience

RECOVER_PASSWORD_PAGE.TITLE: Please enter your new password and confirm it below

PROFILE_PAGE.NO_POSTS: This user hasn't made any posts yet

WELCOME_PHOTO_PAGE.TITLE: To begin, please choose an image for your
WELCOME_PHOTO_PAGE.CONTENT: You will be able to change your avatar later in your profile.

SETTINGS_PAGE.TITLE: User account settings
SETTINGS_PAGE.CHANGE_VISIBILITY: Change the visibility of your account
SETTINGS_PAGE.CHANGE_PASSWORD_MESSAGE: Change the password of your In2Art user account
SETTINGS_PAGE.COOKIES_MESSAGE: Choose if you want to accept all cookies or reject optional cookies
SETTINGS_PAGE.DELETE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Once you delete your account, you will have thirty days to recover it

TOOLTIP.NICKNAME: Nickname will be used in the user's profile URL. Please enter a single word without spaces
TOOLTIP.PROFILE_NAME: This is the name that will be visible to other users on the platform. Feel free to enter your real name or choose name that you're comfortable with
TOOLTIP.NICKNAME_EDIT: The nickname is used in the user profile URL. There is no option to change your nickname at this time.
TOOLTIP.PROFILE_NAME_EDIT: This name is visible to other users on the platform.
TOOLTIP.ASPECT_MESSAGE: Now you can craft your gallery's first impression by selecting the aspect ratio for your artwork cover. Rest assured, your full masterpiece remains untouched and is viewable in its entirety on the 'Full Image' screen.
TOOLTIP.ASPECT_WARNING: Your artwork cover will be cropped for display in the gallery, but you have control to adjust its aspect. Rest assured, the full, unaltered image of your artwork is accessible on the 'Full Image' screen.

IMAGE_CROPPER.DRAG_DROP: Click to browse or drag and drop your picture
IMAGE_CROPPER.PHOTO_INFO: Remember to save your data because your profile photo is changed

ARTWORK.TITLE: Upload Artwork
ARTWORK.ARTIST_EMPTY_MESSAGE: Artist not found. If you're certain about the spelling, we'll gladly create a new entry for the artist

PLACEHOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Brief overview of the artwork, e.g., 'A vibrant night sky filled with swirling stars'
PLACEHOLDER.OTHER: Any other details or comments about the artwork
PLACEHOLDER.DIMENSIONS: Size of the artwork, e.g., '73.7 cm × 92.1 cm'
PLACEHOLDER.TITLE: Artwork's title, e.g., 'Starry Night'
Enter a catchy title for your post
PLACEHOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Describe what's on your mind or share the story behind the pictures. Feel free to discuss anything from daily inspiration to personal milestones.
PLACEHOLDER.TAGS: Add relevant tags, e.g., ‘abstract’, ‘DigitalArt'. Press space to create each tag.

SET_PHOTO_PAGE.TITLE: Set your user icon
SET_PHOTO_PAGE.CONTENT: You can choose one of the proposed images or upload your own

ASPECT_RATIO.TITLE: Aspect ratio for cover picture
ASPECT_RATIO.MESSAGE_1: Now you can craft your gallery's first impression by selecting the aspect ratio for your artwork
ASPECT_RATIO.MESSAGE_2: . Rest assured, your full masterpiece remains untouched and is viewable in its entirety on the 'Full Image' screen.
ASPECT_RATIO.WARNING_2: will be cropped for display in the gallery, but you have control to adjust its aspect. Rest assured, the full, unaltered image of your artwork is accessible on the 'Full Image' screen.

COOKIE_POPUP.MESSAGE_1: We want to offer you the best possible experience in our products, so we use cookies and similar technologies. These allow us to provide and improve our services, ensure your safety and provide you with personalized features in In2Art Products.
COOKIE_POPUP.MESSAGE_2: Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly.
COOKIE_POPUP.MESSAGE_3: Learn more about our cookies and how we use them in our Cookies Policy. You can review or change your preferences at any time. Thank you for allowing us to improve your In2Art experience.

DELETE_ACCOUNT_PAGE.TITLE: Delete your account
DELETE_ACCOUNT_PAGE.TITLE_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
DELETE_ACCOUNT_PAGE.MESSAGE_2: Delicate information related to your account will be deleted
